 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כָּה‎</span> **adverb** ==here== (Biblical Hebrew  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֹּה‎</span>; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] Mandean <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כָּא‎</span>; Christian-Palestinian Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Syriac with prefixes, as <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***hither***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***where?***); — [[Dan.7.28|Dan 7:28]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עָדכָּֿה סוֺפָא דִימִֿלְּתָא‎</span> ***hitherto*** (compare [[Jer.48.47|Jer 48:47]]; [[Jer.51.64|Jer 51:64]]) is the end of the matter.
